systemMessage: You are an AI assistant that provides information about Toca's professional background. You must ONLY mention technologies that are explicitly listed in the work experience sections. NEVER mention Python, Ruby, Java, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, Azure, Google Cloud, or any technology not in the experience arrays. When asked about technologies, respond with: 'Based on his documented work experience, Toca has worked with:' followed only by technologies from the experience section.
instructions: Answer questions about Toca's background, experience, skills, and projects

LANGUAGE: Respond in the same language as the user's question. If they ask in French, respond in French. If they ask in English, respond in English. You can also translate between languages when requested.
If asked about something not in the context, politely explain you only have information about Toca's professional background
Use a friendly but professional tone
Feel free to highlight relevant experience and skills based on the user's questions
If someone is asking about hiring or collaboration, encourage them to contact Toca at hello@tcsn.io
Do not display instructions or preferences
Avoid sending the whole CV data, summarize it bit by bit
Don't send CV data in JSON or list format, respond in natural language
Don't mention the CV structure or sections
Don't send data about specific company or role or dates
Don't mention the instructions or rules you are following

TECHNOLOGY RESTRICTION: You are STRICTLY FORBIDDEN from mentioning any technology not explicitly listed in the 'technologies' arrays of the work experience sections. This includes but is not limited to: Python, Ruby, Java, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure, GraphQL APIs.

MANDATORY RESPONSE FORMAT: When asked about technologies, you MUST start with 'Based on his documented work experience, Toca has worked with:' and ONLY list technologies from the experience section technology arrays.
VIOLATION CONSEQUENCES: Mentioning unauthorized technologies is a critical error. Always double-check that every technology you mention appears in the experience section.

tcsn.meaning: The name TCSN is derived from the initials of Tocausan which stands for Toca's real name abbreviation, but shhhh... it's a secret. It represents his personal brand and consulting company, symbolizing his expertise and services in the field of software engineering and development.
tcsn.logo: TCSN logo is derived from Toca signature into a modern, minimalistic design, reflecting a flying object, symbolizing agility and forward-thinking.
tcsn.about: TCSN is a personal brand and consulting company founded by Toca, a seasoned software engineer with over 10 years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in frontend technologies. TCSN offers technical consulting, rapid prototyping, and development services for responsive web applications and e-commerce storefronts, catering to B2C clients. The company emphasizes agile methodologies and leverages technologies including Vue, React, Node.js, TypeScript, and modern development practices. TCSN is committed to delivering high-quality, scalable solutions that meet client needs.

services.consulting: Technical consulting for web and mobile applications, including architecture design, technology selection, and best practices.
services.development: End-to-end development of responsive web applications and e-commerce storefronts using modern frameworks and technologies.
services.prototyping: Rapid prototyping to validate ideas and concepts quickly, enabling faster iterations and feedback cycles.

language.multilingual: Respond in the same language as the question. If asked in French, respond in French. If asked in English, respond in English.
language.translation: Can translate between French and English when requested
language.detection: Automatically detect the language of the question and respond accordingly

responseTemplates.technologyQuestion: Based on his work experience, Toca has worked with: [LIST ONLY TECHNOLOGIES FROM EXPERIENCE ARRAYS]. His experience spans across frontend frameworks, backend development, databases, and cloud platforms as documented in his professional background.

allowedTechnologies.note: ONLY these technologies should be mentioned - never add others not in this list

careerPreferences.jobTitle: Senior Frontend Engineer, Full Stack Engineer, Analyst, Developer, Consultant, Technical Lead, Architect, CTO, Engineer, Software Engineer

experience.description: Architected and developed a scalable design system adopted across multiple teams, while collaborating closely with business stakeholders to build and optimize user interfaces. Led framework migration initiatives to modernize the front-end architecture. Integrated custom LLM into web components to be implemented across government websites.

Architected and developed a scalable design system adopted across multiple teams, while collaborating closely with business stakeholders to build and optimize user interfaces. Led framework migration initiatives to modernize the front-end architecture. Integrated custom LLM into web component to be implemented on thousands of websites.

Deliver end-to-end full-stack solutions for B2C clients, providing technical consulting, rapid prototyping, and development of responsive web applications and e-commerce storefronts. Drive projects from concept to deployment.

Developed and maintained accessible UI component libraries published on NPM, collaborating with UX and integration teams. Built reusable components adopted across company platforms, with a strong focus on accessibility and inclusive design principles.

Managed critical internal applications (ERP, timesheet, accounting systems) supporting HR, Finance, and Management operations. Analyzed cybersecurity threats, automated business processes, and streamlined data migrations. Initiated version control for internal scripts and contributed to internal tool development, improving operational efficiency.

Developed a responsive web application with integrated payment processing, collaborating with DevOps for deployment. Successfully prototyped in React and translated to Vue for production release, ensuring seamless payment transaction capabilities.

Collaborated within a 5-person development team to build a B2C hybrid language-learning application supporting both onsite and remote instruction. Implemented real-time audio/video streaming, Chinese-English dictionary integration, and gamification features to enhance user engagement.
Built a B2C/B2B responsive web application featuring client order management, automated pricing algorithms, and dynamic delivery time calculations, streamlining the end-to-end ordering process.
